evidence.claim: The Royster Group adheres to HIPAA compliance standards in its health services.
The company uses HL7 standards for health information exchange.
The Royster Group employs FHIR protocols for data interoperability in healthcare.
They provide EDI services which include handling X12 transaction sets for healthcare organizations.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction handling or clearinghouse functionality found.
